story.text: PARIS Jan 3 Sociedade Nacional de Combustiveis de Angola (Sonangol E.P.) and Total Exploration and Production Angola (TOTF.PA) said on Wednesday they made a new oil discovery in Block 32 offshore Angola. Drilled at a water depth of 1,806 metres, the Salsa-1 well tested at a rate of 3,686 barrels per day of oil, the statement said. Sonangol holds the concession rights for Block 32. Total holds a 30 percent interest as operator. Total's other partners in the contractor's group are Marathon Oil Company (MRO.N) --30 percent, Sonangol E.P. -- 20 percent, Esso Exploration and Production Angola (XOM.N) (Overseas) Limited -- 15 percent, and Petrogal -- 5 percent.
story.title: total , sonangol in oil discovery offshore angola
